definition: to correct/to rectify/to redress/strong/brave/to pretend/to feign/affectation

sentences.english: People interested in the above article What Are Orthotics?
sentences.chinese: “感兴趣的人以上文章”什么是矫形？

sentences.english: Lower limb exoskeleton orthosis was used as rehabilitation device in gait training.
sentences.chinese: 设计用于步态康复训练的下肢外骨骼矫形器。

sentences.english: Objective In order to explore the value of knee orthosis (KO) in treatment of joint contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨矫形器对膝关节挛缩的治疗价值。

sentences.english: Orthotics are orthopedic devices that are used to treat a variety of biomechanical foot disorders.
sentences.chinese: 骨科矫形是设备，用于治疗各种脚病的生物力学。

sentences.english: Dai said.At his first opportunity, he switched to orthopedics.
sentences.chinese: 于是一有机会，他就跳到矫形外科去了。

sentences.english: The forces which act upon the load-bearing members will vary depending upon the particular orthopaedic instrument.
sentences.chinese: 作用在承载构件上的力将取决于特定矫形器材来改变。

sentences.english: Does the belt after tooth orthopaedic maintain implement does time need time for ages after all?
sentences.chinese: 牙矫形后带保持器的时间究竟需要好久时间？

sentences.english: The application of orthosis and self-help aids to hemiplegic upper extremity was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 对中风后偏瘫上肢应用矫形器和自助具进行了综述。

sentences.english: Anti-spasticity orthotic devices were used and conventional rehabilitation treatments were conducted after injection.
sentences.chinese: 注射后佩戴抗痉挛矫形器及常规康复训练。

sentences.english: But in shoe orthotic inserts it can work only in foot-flat stages.
sentences.chinese: 但是鞋中的矫形嵌入物可能仅在“扁平足”时期有效。

sentences.english: American Journal of Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics.
sentences.chinese: 美国正牙学与牙面矫形学杂志。

sentences.english: Removable insoles supply fitting flexibility and allows for a custom orthotic.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸鞋垫供应配件的灵活性，并允许自定义的矫形。
我强烈建议订造内里鞋矫形。

sentences.english: I need a management software for orthopedic and orthotic practitioners.
sentences.chinese: 我需要和矫形骨科医生管理软件。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of wrist hand orthoses on cerebral palsy children with adduction of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察腕手矫形器治疗脑瘫患儿拇指内收的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Function of knee joint contracture was improved using knee orthosis.
sentences.chinese: 结论矫形器治疗能明显改善挛缩兔膝关节功能。

definition: to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
to correct (e.g. sight or hearing)/to rectify/to cure
